description:
Light and strong composite pedals with a familiar profile. Whether your looking to give your urban steed the grip of your trail bike, or just like low-profile pedals on your mountain bike, the Chinook will help you put the power down.

  • Sealed cartridge and bearing for an easy spin
  • Big 113 x 114mm platform for efficient power transfer
  • Nylon composite is light and strong
  • 6 replaceable and 4 fixed pins per side
name: MEC Chinook Pedals
